comments.body: Added `--quiet` here because the number of tests is large and printing out all of their results make it painful to search failed tests.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +8,12 @@
# NB: Also add --ignore'd tests to run-small-python-tests.sh
pytest tests --quiet --large --ignore-flavors --ignore=tests/examples

test $err = 0
